data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Hypleurochilus (Teleostei: Blenniidae) from Trindade Island and Martin Vaz Archipelago, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinheiro, Hudson T., Gasparini, João Luiz, Rangel, Carlos A. (2013): A new species of the genus Hypleurochilus (Teleostei: Blenniidae) from Trindade Island and Martin Vaz Archipelago, Brazil. Zootaxa 3709 (1): 95-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3709.1.5
